ing: 1 (12 ounce) container frozen whipped topping (such as Cool WhipÂ®), thawed
2 (3 ounce) packages orange-flavored gelatin (such as Jell-OÂ®)
des: "This is my favorite, handed down from my grandmother to my mother and to me. Great for anytime snacking as well."
ins: Stir cottage cheese and whipped topping together in a bowl; sprinkle gelatin over the top and mix thoroughly. Stir pineapple, oranges, and marshmallows into cottage cheese mixture. Cover the bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate until chilled, at least 1 hour.
